Title: Episode Four
Plot: Curtis tries to use his superpower to go back to the past and change what happened the night he was caught by the cops, but he discovers that changing history isn't as easy as he thought.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Anna Koval, Alex Reid, Stephen Wight, Michael Obiora, Perry Benson, Benjamin Smith, Jamie Blackley, Danny Sapani
